DataElement.preferredName: Patient Prior Randomization Electrocardiography Eligibility Determination Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to patient's criteria to determine eligibility based on an ECG prior to randomization/treatment assignment._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Prior Randomization Electrocardiography Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to patient's criteria to determine eligibility based on an ECG prior to randomization/treatment assignment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.: A procedure which records the electrical current in the heart in the form of a continuous strip graph. The electrocardiography results may determine whether the heart is performing normally or suffering from abnormalities, may indicate coronary artery blockages, can be used for detecting calcium, magnesium and other electrolyte disturbances, allow the detection of conduction abnormalities, indicate the physical shape of a patient during stress test and provide information on the physical condition of the heart.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.
A procedure that displays the electrical activity of the heart.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have resting
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have resting electrocardiogram (ECG) with clinically significant abnormal findings or with QTc > 470 msec on 2 or more time points within a 24 hour period or family history of long QT syndrome?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have resting electrocardiogram (ECG) with clinically significant abnormal findings or with QTc greater than 470 msec on 2 or more time points within a 24 hour period or family history of long QT syndrome?
